original_title: 泥●NTR町内会 妻が最近やたらとご近所さんと仲が良いワケ≪理由≫ 星野ナミ
overview: Four years after getting married, I just bought my long-awaited home and moved to a new house. Unbeknownst to me, her wife had become strangely close to a member of the neighborhood association. One day, the couple was invited to a social gathering. I'm not good at drinking, so I got drunk right away, but when I got a video of the drinking party later... While apologizing to me who was sleeping, I did yoga with a stranger's stick, a horny wife I've never seen before The foolery was recorded. No way, such a shameful thing happens at a weekly meeting ... Annoying erection! !
title: Drunk Girl at the Neighborhood Association Meeting – My Wife is Finally Getting Along with the Neighbors – Nami Hoshino
